artifact.content:
Name MANAGE HARDWARE Use Case Number Use Case # 1 Authors Group 11 Event Admin requests to perform a hardware management functions/activities
System System Console
Actors Administrator (initiator)
Overview This use case captures the process of the Administrator setting system parameters, viewing system error history, viewing hardware status information, performing searches associated with a IP address or phone number, including tests on individual phones, enabling, disabling and resetting IP Addresses

Name MANAGE USERS Use Case Number Use Case #2 Authors Group 11 Event Admin requests to perform user management functions
System System Console
Actors Administrator (initiator)
Overview This use case captures the process of the Administrator managing user information, adding new users and new user accounts to the system and activating or suspending users

Name MANAGE ACCOUNTS Use Case Number Use Case #3 Authors Group 11 Event Administrator manages user accounts
System System Console
Actors Administrator, System
Overview This use case captures the process of the Administrator managing accounts, includes the process adding new user accounts

Name MANAGE CALLING PLANS Use Case Number Use Case #4 Authors Group 11 Event Admin request to perform calling plan activities
System System Console
Actors Administrator
Overview This use case captures the process of the Administrator creating, viewing, modifying or removing calling plans

Name MANAGE BILLS Use Case Number Use Case #5 Authors Group 11 Event Admin requests to perform tasks related to the bill
System System Console
Actors Administrator (initiator)
Overview This use case captures the process of the Administrator searching, viewing, modifying, adjusting, resending bills as well as recording bill payment

Name TEST HARDWARE Use Case Number Use Case # 6 Authors Group 11 Event Admin requests to perform a hardware test
System System Console
Actors Administrator (initiator)
Overview This use case captures the process of the Administrator

Name MAKE CALL Use Case Number Use Case #7 Authors Group 11 Event The User initiates a call
System User Phones
Actors UserA � Caller, UserB � Callee
Overview This use case captures the process of the User initiating a call and the callee answering the call

Name SYSTEM INITIALISATION Use Case Number Use Case #8 Authors Group 11 Event System perform initialisation when System is first starting
System System
Actors Overview This use case captures the process of initialising the phone system
Related Use Cases Use Case #1 � Hardware Management

Name SYSTEM SHUTDOWN Use Case Number Use Case #9 Authors Group 11 Event System performs shutdown
System System
Actors Overview This use case captures the process of the system shutting down, whether due to power failure or due to routine maintenance
